description:
When an old friend requests Miaâ€™s help restoring an old cathedral, she packs her bags for the seaside town of Porto Nacosti, Italy! 
But she soon finds trouble in paradise - a crypt below the church holds a long-lost secret that a powerful family is desperate to keep. 
Search through visually dazzling hidden-object scenes, restore art pieces in need of love, and reveal what history forgot in Faircroft's Antiques: The Forbidden Crypt!

- 5 bonus chapters set after the main story ends!
- Help someone learn the meaning of community in a bonus location!
- More than 30 new levels!
name: Faircroft's Antiques: The Forbidden Crypt Collector's Edition
